name: HCVAntibodyTest
title: HCV Antibody Test
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Laboratory Tests.),(Data Element Scope: Hepatitis C virus antibody test.),(Inclusion Criteria: Hepatitis C virus antibody test without mentioning of laboratory method or using enzyme immunoassay method, performed on serum/plasma specimen type.),(Exclusion Criteria: Hepatitis C virus antibody test performed on specimen type other than serum/plasma, or performed using immunoblotting laboratory method.)
